com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch

Class NonDelegatingClassLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.ClassLoader
      • java.security.SecureClassLoader
        • java.net.URLClassLoader
          • com.mumfrey.liteloader.launch.NonDelegatingClassLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class NonDelegatingClassLoader
extends java.net.URLClassLoader
    ClassLoader which only allows whitelisted classes to be loaded, used to pre-load packet transformer classes to ensure that they don't reference any external classes.
    Author:
    Adam Mummery-Smith
